truth.title: One God
body: We affirm that God is One and only one not three persons.
God created the heavens and the earth alone through his Word by himself there was no one beside him.

truth.title: Salvation
body: To be saved one MUST be born again: which is to be born of the water and of the Spirit.
We affirm that salvation is exclusively found in the body of Jesus Christ through the remission of sin by his blood.
The only way to obtain the blood of Christ is to be baptized in his name not titles.

truth.title: Salvation of Children
body: We affirm that there God is One and only one not three persons.
God created the heavens and the earth alone through his Word by himself there was no one beside him.

truth.title: Holiness
body: We affirm that there God is One and only one not three persons.
